item.title: CloverPit
item.description:
Title: CloverPit
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , Simulation , Sports , Strategy , Free To Play
Developer: Panik Arcade
Publisher: Future Friends Games
Franchise: Future Friends Games
Release Date: Sep 26, 2025




About This Game

CloverPit is the demonic lovechild of Balatro and Buckshot Roulette , a rogue-lite that traps players in a hell of their own creation. Locked in a rusty cell with a slot machine and an ATM, you must pay off your debt at the end of each round, or fall to ruin – literally!

Manipulate the slot machine to earn extra coins. Turn the odds in your favor with various prizes and charms that trigger big big combos, snowballing into a dazzling lucky run. Bend the rules, break the game, and pay off your captor long enough to earn a shot at freedom.

Features:

A gripping rogue-lite where every round could be your last!

Meta-progression, seeded runs, unlockable run modifiers and power-ups!

Push your score to new heights in Endless Mode!

A hellish escape room atmosphere!

150 + items and synergies to boost your luck!

A sinister tale of addiction and escape!

P.S. IS THIS GAMBLING?

Hell no! CloverPit is a rogue-lite horror game, and not a slot machine simulator. Our slot machine is designed to be broken and ultimately overcome, and will never ask you for real money!


Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 or more
    • Processor: Intel i3 4th generation or equivalent
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Most dedicated GPUs should work.
    • Storage: 512 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: HOTEL BARCELONA
item.description:
Title: HOTEL BARCELONA
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: White Owls Inc.
Publisher: CULT Games
Release Date: Sep 26, 2025




About This Game

HOTEL BARCELONA ホテル・バルセロナ: A Blood-Soaked, 2.5D Slasher Action Game from SUDA51 and SWERY

A mysterious hotel stands in a remote location on the border between Pennsylvania and West Virginia. Its luxurious appearance hides a terrifying truth: it’s a trap for America’s most dangerous serial killers.

You are Justine, a novice federal marshal with a deadly secret - your mind is shared with Dr. Carnival, a deranged murderer with a violent past. Together, you must eliminate every killer in the hotel… and try to survive long enough to escape.

Experience a Unique 2.5D Action System

This is not a simple side-scrolling action game. The intense battles require tactical movement, precise timing, and clever use of your abilities. Environments are rich with danger and drenched in 1980s American horror movie atmosphere.

Use Death to Your Advantage: “Slasher Phantoms”

Every time you die, a memory of your past self is born. These echoes, known as Slasher Phantoms, repeat your exact movements from the previous run, and can deal real damage to enemies.

Use them as shields, allies, or distractions. With each failure, your strength multiplies.

Grow Stronger with Every Drop of Blood

The more you fight, the more you’re covered in blood. This isn’t just visual flare. Blood fuels your power.

Fill the Skull Gauge by staying aggressive, and when it reaches its peak, unleash Carnival Awakening: a devastating special attack that unleashes something unstoppable but monstrous.

Seven Horror-Inspired Zones, Seven Deadly Bosses

Explore seven unique areas within HOTEL BARCELONA, each inspired by a different sub-genre of horror.

From haunted mansions to twisted laboratories, each zone contains an unforgettable boss battle that demands analysis, strategy, and quick reflexes.

A Collaboration Between Two Legendary Creators

SUDA51 (No More Heroes, Killer7) and SWERY (Deadly Premonition, The Good Life) team up for the first time in this original horror-action project.

Their distinct styles combine into a surreal, gore-filled, unforgettable experience.

Online Multiplayer: Co-op Missions and PvP Invasions

At first glance, HOTEL BARCELONA may look like a single-player roguelike. However, the game also features robust online multiplayer if you know how to unlock it. Up to three players can join forces in co-op mode, working together to complete missions and survive the hotel's murderous inhabitants. And for those seeking a more competitive thrill, PvP mode allows a fourth player to invade your world, hunting or being hunted in a brutal cat-and-mouse game.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Players in this title fight humanoid enemies using a variety of melee weapons. The humanoid enemy is a violent bloodbath with loss of limbs, and the bloodshed is directly related to the game system.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.7GHz
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 12 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit, Windows 11 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i7 @ 4.2GHz
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070, Radeon RX 5700 XT
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 12 GB available space

item.title: Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian
item.description:
Title: Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian
Genre: RPG
Developer: KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.
Publisher: KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.
Franchise: KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.
Release Date: Sep 25, 2025




About This Game

Two young adults return to their lost hometown in search of truth and to bring back what they hold dear.

Field

Freely roam around the Lantarna mainland while enjoying battles and gathering materials! Players can enjoy their adventure while taking in scenery like never before, experiencing the passage of time from day to night and changes in weather. Switch between Rias and Slade anytime, each bringing their own unique field actions to the adventure!

Dimensional Paths

In the multi-floor dungeon Dimensional Paths, the map layout and monsters change with every challenge. The higher the difficulty, the more valuable ingredients you can obtain. Powerful enemies and treasure chests may also yield rare equipment known as Starpearls. Venture into the Dimensional Paths in pursuit of premium synthesis ingredients and coveted Starpearls!

Combat

Engage in thrilling battles with a highly strategic Timeline Command Battle system!
Up to three party members can be placed on both the front and back rows. Enjoy fighting as one united force, and utilize new elements such as Multi-actions , Item Mix, and Link Attacks to add even more excitement to battles.

Synthesis

Create your own unique items using the simple yet intricate “Gift Color Synthesis”!
In this simple system, items can be made by adding ingredients according to the recipes. By linking the Gift Colors of ingredients, their traits will be carried over to the finished product. Players can also unlock new recipes by adding specific ingredients to certain recipes.
Additionally, each recipe has three arrangement slots where extra ingredients can be added, boosting the effects of the finished product.

Town Development & Shop Management

Sell items created through synthesis or found while exploring! Help boost the town's restoration activities by selling a variety of items, and then invest the profits and resources earned from the shop to develop the town further. As the town starts to bustle once again, reference books containing new synthesis recipes will be made available, and the story will develop!

Characters

Rias Eidreise (Hina Tachibana)
Slade Clauslyter (Shunichi Toki)

Characters from previous Atelier series games will also join your party!
Razeluxe Meitzen
Totooria Helmold
Wilbell Voll-Ersleid
Sophie Neuenmuller

Meet a wide cast of familiar characters from throughout the Atelier series!

Story

The town of Hallfein once rested on the border between three provinces, prospering thanks to mining and trade.
However, a mysterious tragedy struck the peaceful town, and most of its residents completely vanished.
Hallfein became a restricted area, and access was forbidden to all except investigators from the capital.

Years passed, and the restrictions were eventually lifted, after which plans to restore the town were put together. Taking this opportunity, a young man and young woman follow their hearts and return to Hallfein after being forced to leave it so long ago; the young woman wanting to restore the shop previously run by her missing grandfather, and the young man hoping to learn more about the items left to him by his departed father. They both also seek to learn why the town's residents vanished that day.

The two will meet and set out on a journey in search of the truth together. However, neither could imagine just what would await them on that journey.

Note:
- Please check the official site for details.
- Please be aware that other editions containing this product exist. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

    • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 以上、AMD Ryzen 3 3200G 以上
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB 以上、AMD Radeon R9 380X 4GB 以上
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    • Sound Card: 16bitステレオ48kHzWAVE形式が再生可能なもの
    • Additional Notes: ウィンドウサイズ 1280×720 30FPS グラフィック設定「LOW」 ※Windows® 11をご使用の場合、Windows® 11のシステム要件に準じます。
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 以上、AMD Ryzen 3 3100 以上
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 8GB 以上、AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT (Rev2) 6GB 以上
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    • Sound Card: 16bitステレオ48kHzWAVE形式が再生可能なもの
    • Additional Notes: ウィンドウサイズ 1920×1080 60FPS グラフィック設定「Standard」 ※Windows® 11をご使用の場合、Windows® 11のシステム要件に準じます。

item.title: EA SPORTS FC™ 26
item.description:
Title: EA SPORTS FC™ 26
Genre: Simulation , Sports
Developer: EA Canada
Publisher: Electronic Arts
Franchise: EA SPORTS FC™
Release Date: Sep 25, 2025




About This Game



This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items, including a random selection of virtual in-game items.

AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

Generative AI may have been used in creating pre-rendered or live-generated content for this game. All such content is the result of a human-led artistic and creative process.




System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10/11 - 64-Bit (Latest Update).
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel Core i5 6600k
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD RX 570 or Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 100 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX: 12 Compatible video card or equivalent (feature level 12_0)
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10/11 - 64-Bit (Latest Update).
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or Intel Core i7 6700
    • Memory: 12 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD RX 5600 XT or Nvidia GTX 1660
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 100 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX: 12 Compatible video card or equivalent (feature level 12_0)

item.title: Mars First Logistics
item.description:
Title: Mars First Logistics
Genre: Indie , Simulation
Developer: Shape Shop
Publisher: Shape Shop , Outersloth
Release Date: Sep 25, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jun 21, 2023




About This Game

Mars First Logistics is an open world physics simulation game where you design and build mechanized rovers to deliver stuff. Play solo or with up to 3 friends in online co-op!


Design and assemble your rover using an intuitive and tactile editor. Combine over 100 parts including springs, hydraulic cylinders, servo motors, rocket engines and many more to tailor your creations to the unique challenges of each job, or just let your imagination run wild.


Pilot your creations across the vast, procedurally generated terrain of Mars. Heavy cargo, fragile cargo, bouncy cargo, cargo that’s trying to float away – you never know what new challenges lay around the corner!


Help the Martians complete their construction projects by moving their awkwardly shaped cargo from place to place. With each successful delivery you'll earn funds, unlock new parts and blueprints and gain access to new infrusture such as roads, powerlines and monorails to build!

Features


  • Intuitive, Flexible Building: Make your rovers as simple or complex as you’d like! Create anything you want, no matter how ridiculous.
  • Sky’s The Limit: No one right answer leaves success up to your creativity and ingenuity.
  • Open World: Traverse the striking, procedurally generated open world, with new challenges over every horizon.
  • Make Mars Home: Watch new buildings spring up as you complete deliveries. Connect buildings using roads, monorails, power lines, water pipes and more!
  • Unlock Parts: Unlock and combine parts like servo motors, hydraulic cylinders and rocket engines.
  • Co-op: Tackle the challenge solo, or recruit up to 3 friends in online co-op.
  • Play your way: Play in standard or creative modes or tweak individual game settings to your liking.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
    • Processor: 4-core
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD HD 6970
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
